static final String ISO_8859_1 = "ISO-8859-1"

Detailed Description

Various common methods for getting data from CRANE records and putting data into CRANE records, for both big-endian and little-endian data.

Version:
Id
ProtocolDataCommon.java,v 1.4 2005/01/30 15:13:43 ilyad Exp

final String com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ProtocolDataCommon::getStringWithLen (  byte[]  record,
int  length,
int  offsetString
)  [inline]
  

00058                                                                                        {
00059         try {
00060             return new String(record, offsetString, length, ISO_8859_1);
00061         } catch (java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
00062             // This is not supposed to happen because ISO-8859-1 is
00063             // required for all conforming Java
00064             // implementations. Anyway, let's do things the hard way:
00065             StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer(length);
00066             for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00067                 result.append((char)record[offsetString + i]);
00068             }
00069             return result.toString();
00070         }
00071     }

final void com::xacct::CRANE::collector::ProtocolDataCommon::putStringShortLen (  byte[]  record,
int  offsetLength,
int  offsetString,
String  value
)  [inline]
  

00085                                                                                                           {
00086         try {
00087             byte [] b = value.getBytes(ISO_8859_1);
00088             putUnsignedShort(record, offsetLength, b.length);
00089             System.arraycopy(b, 0, record, offsetString, b.length);
00090         } catch (java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
00091             // Not supposed to happen; let's do it another way:
00092             int length = value.length();
00093             putUnsignedShort(record, offsetLength, length);
00094             for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00095                 record[offsetString + i] = (byte)value.charAt(i);
00096             }
00097         }
00098     }
